root.name: T2: The Arcade
root.description: OverviewBeing a light-gun game without a light gun T2: The Arcade follows the form of games like Operation Wolf. Your mission is to save John Connor from T-1000.Critical ReceptionWhen released Electronic Gaming Monthly issued the scores of, 7,7,7,6 adding, "...The graphics are detailed and the sounds are also very good. The game play is missing a few things but stays true to the arcade in most respects".
